item.title: Andie add a quote by John Churton Collins
item.description: "In prosperity our friends know us; in adversity we know our friends." -- John Churton Collins

item.title: Andie add a quote by John Churton Collins
item.description: "Never claim as a right what you can ask as a favor." -- John Churton Collins

item.title: Andie add a quote by henry david thoreau
item.description: "if i repent of anything, it is very likely to be my good behavior. what demon possessed me that i behaved so well?" -- henry david thoreau

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I can't go back to yesterday because I was a different person then." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "But I don’t want to go among mad people," Alice remarked. "Oh, you can’t help that," said the Cat: "we’re all mad here. I’m mad. You’re mad." "How do you know I’m mad?" said Alice. "You must be," said the Cat, or you wouldn’t have come here." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Why, sometimes I've believed as many as six impossible things before breakfast." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "One of the deep secrets of life is that all that is really worth the doing is what we do for others." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I wonder if the snow loves the trees and fields, that it kisses them so gently? And then it covers them up snug, you know, with a white quilt; and perhaps it says "Go to sleep, darlings, till the summer comes again." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "I know who I WAS when I got up this morning, but I think I must have been changed several times since then" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Caroll
item.description: "If everybody minded their own business, the world would go around a great deal faster than it does." -- Lewis Caroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Why it's simply impassible! Alice: Why, don't you mean impossible? Door: No, I do mean impassible. <i>(chuckles)</i> Nothing's impossible!" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Everything is funny, if you can laugh at it." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "No, no! The adventures first, explanations take such a dreadful time." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "In a Wonderland they lie, Dreaming as the days go by, Dreaming as the summers die: Ever drifting down the stream- Lingering in the golden gleam- Life, what is it but a dream?" -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Lewis Carroll
item.description: "Contrariwise,' continued Tweedledee, 'if it was so, it might be; and if it were so, it would be; but as it isn't, it ain't. That's logic." -- Lewis Carroll

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Walk towards the sunshine, and the shadows will fall behind you." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "If you don't like something, change it; if you can't change it, change the way you think about it. " -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Happiness must be grown in one's own garden. " -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Bloom Where You're Planted" -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "If your ship hasn't come in, swim out to it." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "So many people com einto our lives and then leave the way they came. But there are those precious few who touch our hearts so deeply we will never be the same." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Friendship needs no reason!" -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "A constant FRIEND is a thing rare and hard to find." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Ah! How good it feels the hand of an old friend." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Every calling is great when greatly pursued." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "Friend is a gift you give yourself." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
item.description: "A friend is what the heart needs all the time." -- Mary Engelbreit

item.title: Andie add a quote by Mary Engelbreit
